Quet:

"Scourge ins't the commander of ark... bet he is "my 
commander" "replied Quet

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> She turned her optics to Quet. "Scourge is not commander of the 
Ark. However, 
> Rodimus Prime would have presedence over it above all of us."
> 
> She then turned to Kup. "Perhaps we should arrange a summit 
meeting with 
> Rodimus upon this issue." The idea was something she was open to. 
Highly unusual 
> for her. Her loathing for Autobots usually kept her from even 
associating with 
> them.
